Description: Bluish-green glass candlestick bottle; concave base; triangular body merging into cylindrical neck with three horizontal coils and four vertical bands; two handles from rim to top coil; pontil on base; blown.
Acquisition notes: Correspondence dated 2 May 1913 (q.v. Murray) refers to a plate said to be from the Fayoum region of Egypt and a collection from Durighello (10 May).
